titleStmt.title: The copy of the Kings Maiesties letters patents, concerning the reformation of the abuses vsed in melting and making vp of lead, and the sealing of the same.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

notesStmt.note: Imprint information suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: cropped and tightly bound, with loss of text. Best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
